title: Can You Keep Your Covenant with God?
description:
I haven't done a video on my Old Testament reading in a while, so here it is. The main theme I'm tracking throughout these excerpts is the idea of keeping or not keeping the covenant; everything seems to relate to this idea. 

The notes I used in this video can be found here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/19KyrjcAjn7l8yhVap3yZHzPYc9M-Y28ScvycF9ikKC4/edit?usp=sharing

This is episode 53 of my podcast. 

My Writing: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/

There is an audio version of my videos (on all podcast platforms): https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

About Me: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/about?utm_source=menu-dropdown
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/officialcoltonkirby/
Odysee: https://odysee.com/@ColtonKirby
